participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: Frustrated and cynical, Mark has a pragmatic outlook on life, often expressing dissatisfaction with his circumstances.
participant_1.background: i am 40 years old. i work as a car salesman. my wife spends all my money. i hate my job. i'm planning on getting a divorce.

participant_2.name: Laura
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and friendly, Laura enjoys connecting with others and has a love for animals and sports.
participant_2.background: i have a german shepherd dog. i live is a rural farming community. my husband is adopted. i like to watch nhl hockey.
